Description: Perform a jumping attack.
Press the button at the right time to perform a series of jumping attacks.
Leap high into the air and bring your Keyblade down on the enemy, along with a slew of meteors.
Press the button at the right times to dive repeatedly and create columns of light that send enemies flying.
Punish faraway enemies with a charging attack.
Cloak yourself in fire, then punish faraway enemies with a charging attack.
Cloak yourself in darkness, then charge at faraway enemies. The attack has a chance of dooming them, leaving them five seconds to live.
Press the at the right times to perform a series of charging attacks that will reach faraway enemies.
Press the button at the right times to perform a series of charging attacks that blind or bind some foes.
Assail enemies with a single, blindingly fast Keyblade strike that has a chance of destroying them on the spot.
Throw the Keyblade at the enemy. Stuns some foes.
Cloak the Keyblade in ice and throw it at the enemy. Freezes foes.
Throw the Keyblade at the enemy. Causes some foes to drop prize boxes.
Throw the Keyblade at the enemy. If it connects, the Keyblade will split into beams of light that fly in all directions.
Throw the Keyblade at the enemy, letting the wind guide it toward your target for multiple hits.
Rush the enemy while a ring of fire revolves around you, hitting targets multiple times.
Cloak yourself in a barrier and rush the enemy.
Cloak yourself in electricity and rush the enemy, stunning foes on contact.
Press the button at the right time to knock enemies into the air and then smack them back down.
Assail enemies with a ferocious string of blows. Press at the end to tack on a few extra hits for good measure.
Assail enemies with a ferocious string of blows. Press the button at the end to tack on a few extra hits for good measure.
Inflict Stop on enemies, then press the button at the right times to perform a combo while teleporting.
Perform a jumping attack that poisons some foes.
Strike an enemy three times with a single jumping attack.
Cloak yourself in ice and hit the enemy with a jumping attack, after which ice bursts from the ground for additional damage.
Perform a jumping attack that stuns some foes.
Press the button at the right times to perform three jumping attacks and cause symbols to appear; get three of the same to win prizes.
Cloak the Keyblade in fire and perform a spinning attack at the enemy.
Perform a spinning attack that confuses some foes.
Perform a spinning attack that binds some foes.
Press the button at the right times to knock nearby enemies into the air with a series of whirlwinds.
Knock enemies into the air, then smack them into next year with a powerful spinning attack.
Use magnetic force to pull in surrounding enemies, and then punish them all at once with a single spin attack.
Perform a powerful spinning attack and hit enemies with lots of columns of light at once. You will also recover HP.
Create a whirlwind with a spin attack and send surrounding enemies flying.
Perform a spinning attack that deals additional damage if you are low on HP.
Use magnetic force to pull a single enemy toward you, then send it crashing into other foes.
A leaping strike which causes giant boulders to burst from the earth and deal additional damage.
Expend HP to perform a single, powerful attack.
Restore 10% of Max HP and 10 Focus Points each time you press the button when prompted.
Jump in the air and stomp on an enemy.
Character: Lone Runner (during Illusion-L)

Description: Roll into a ball and jump onto an enemy three times.
Character: Belly Balloon (during Illusion-B)

Description: Launch a ball of fire toward enemies.
Launch a stronger ball of fire toward enemies.
Launch an even stronger ball of fire toward enemies.
Launch a ball of dark fire that blinds some targets.
Launch a ball of fire that explodes when it hits an enemy, catching nearby foes in the blast.
Launch a series of three fireballs toward enemies.
Launch a slow-moving ball of fire that deals multiple hits to a single enemy as it passes through.
Blast enemies head-on with a chunk of ice that cuts right through and potentially deals multiple hits.
Blast enemies head-on with a stronger chunk of ice that cuts through and potentially deals multiple hits.
Blast enemies head-on with an even stronger chunk of ice that cuts through and potentially deals multiple hits.
Blast enemies head-on with a series of three chunks of ice that cut right through and potentially deal multiple hits.
Strike surrounding enemies from above with lightning that shocks other nearby foes if it connects.
Strike surrounding enemies from above with stronger lightning that shocks other nearby foes if it connects.
Strike surrounding enemies from above with even stronger lightning that shocks other nearby foes if it connects.
Blast enemies head-on with a bolt of lightning that shocks other nearby foes if it connects.
Recover a small amount of HP.
Recover a large amount of HP.
Recover a huge amount of HP.
Recover from all negative status effects.
Set a row of explosive magical traps which stun enemies when tripped.
Set explosive magical traps all around you which stun enemies when tripped.
Set explosive magical traps next to you which zoom toward and stun any enemies that get too close.
Create an anti-gravity field and send foes around you drifting into the air for continual damage. Hit floating enemies to confuse them.
Create an anti-gravity field and send foes around you drifting into the air for stronger continual damage. Hit floating enemies to confuse them.
Create an anti-gravity field and send foes around you drifting into the air for even stronger continual damage. Hit floating enemies to confuse them.
Use magnetic force to pull enemies in and deal continual damage.
Use magnetic force to pull enemies in and deal more continual damage.
Use magnetic force to pull enemies in and deal even more continual damage.
Use magnetic force to yank munny right out of enemies.
Use magnetic force to yank HP prizes right out of enemies.
Use magnetic force to yank D-Link prizes right out of enemies.
Call on the wind to lift enemies into the air and then send them flying. Stuns some foes.
Call on the wind to lift enemies into the air and send them flying for more damage. Stuns many foes.
Call on the wind to lift enemies into the air and send them flying for even more damage. Stuns most foes.
Send out columns of light which devastate enemies, and recover HP at the same time.
Potentially wipe an enemy from existence. You will not receive EXP, but the enemy will still drop prizes.
Freezes nearby enemies. Damage dealt to frozen enemies is increased.
Freeze enemies before sending them flying.
Cause giant ice crystals to burst from the ground and knock enemies into the air.
Conjure up a ball of flame overhead, then send fire flying in all directions at once. Ignites some foes.
Cloak yourself in a whirlwind of fire, then fly around at will, dealing damage to enemies on contact.
Use the analog stick to control a mighty whirlwind and drag enemies into the vortex, where they will take continual damage.
Launch a ball of fire that triggers a massive explosion from which no enemy is spared.
Shake the earth and cause boulders to burst forth which knock enemies into the air and stun them in the process.
Bring a giant meteor crashing down on the enemy, triggering an explosion on impact.
Create an anti-gravity field no enemy can escape, then deal damage by sending them hurtling in all directions.
Temporarily reduce the size of enemies. You can step on them while they are shrunk to deal damage.
Blind surrounding enemies to stop them from attacking in your direction.
Ignite the enemy you have locked on and cause it to take continual damage.
Confuse surrounding enemies and cause them to attack each other.
Bind any enemies grouped around the target you have locked on, forcing them to stay in one place.
Poison surrounding enemies and cause them to take continual damage.
Manipulate time to slow down the movement of any enemies grouped around the target you have locked on.
Manipulate time to bring surrounding enemies' movement to a complete halt for 4 seconds.
Manipulate time to bring surrounding enemies' movement to a complete halt for 6 seconds.
Manipulate time to bring surrounding enemies' movement to a complete halt for 8 seconds.
Put surrounding enemies to sleep.
Restore recent damage taken to the Illusion Gauge.
Character: Vitality Vial (during Illusion-V)

Description: Can be used once to restore a small amount of HP.
Can be used once to restore a large amount of HP.
Can be used once to completely restore your HP.
Can be used once to restore a large portion of the Focus Gauge.
Can be used once to completely restore the Focus Gauge.
Can be used once to eliminate all negative status effects.
Can be used once to completely restore your HP and the Focus Gauge. Also eliminates all negative status effects.
Can be used once to completely restore HP, as well as the Focus and D-Link Gauges. Also eliminates all negative status effects.
Can be used once to completely restore the D-Link Gauge.
Can be eaten once to activate the Firestorm Command Style.
Can be eaten once to activate the Diamond Dust Command Style.
Can be eaten once to activate the Thunderbolt Command Style.
Can be eaten once to activate the Critical Impact Command Style.
Can be eaten once to activate the Bladecharge Command Style.
Can be eaten once to activate the Rockbreaker Command Style.
Can be eaten once to activate the Dark Impulse Command Style.
Can be eaten once to activate the Fever Pitch Command Style.
Can be eaten once to activate the Cyclone Command Style.
Can be eaten once to activate the Sky Climber Command Style.
Can be eaten once to activate the Wingblade Command Style.
Can be eaten once to activate the Spellweaver Command Style.
Can be eaten once to activate the Ghost Drive Command Style.
Can be eaten once to activate the Rhythm Mixer Command Style.
Restore a small amount of HP to yourself and nearby friends.
Restore a large amount of HP to yourself and nearby friends.
Restore a huge amount of HP to yourself and nearby friends.
Eliminate all negative status effects from yourself and nearby friends.

Scatter confetti. You might just be glad you did.
(The characters it touches get critical hits on their next attacks.)

Launch fireworks to celebrate. You might just be glad you did.
(The next time you receive damage, it will be seven points.)
Provoke enemies into attacking only you.

Strike a victory pose. You might just be glad you did.
(Receive an EXP bonus equal to triple the EXP of the last foe you defeated.)
Make yourself invisible to friends and foes for a set period of time.
Team up with friends and detonate a light charge. Have everyone press the button at the same time for more power.
Team up with friends and rush the enemy. Press the button that appears at the right time for more power.
Team up with friends and jolt enemies with electricity. Line up your markers with the analog stick to trigger an explosion.
Transform into a Floating Flora and gain access to its abilities for a short period of time.
Transform into a Belly Balloon and gain access to its abilities for a short period of time.
Transform into a Ringer and gain access to its abilities for a short period of time.
Transform into a Lone Runner and gain access to its abilities for a short period of time.
Transform into a Vitality Vial and gain access to its abilities for a short period of time.
Generate a miniature tornado of light that stuns enemies.
Put surrounding enemies to sleep.
Create a cyclone that knocks enemies around in the air.
Throw the Keyblade at an enemy, dropping prizes.
Throw confetti, increasing the chances of a critical hit next attack.
Cast the Mini status effect on surrounding enemies.
Cause a number of enemies to vanish from the field, dropping prizes but no experience.
Restore a large amount of health.
Launch a magical bolt at an enemy.
Pause momentarily, then swing the Keyblade around and thrust upwards into the air.
Rush forward a short distance while cloaked in a barrier.
Restore a large amount of health.
Drill into an enemy, while shrouded by a corona of light.
Teleport around an enemy multiple times, while slashing at them.
Fire a single orb of darkness at an opponent.
Burrow into the ground or if already burrowed, return to the surface.
Character: Floating Flora (during Illusion-F)

Description: Press to jump.
Press to jump higher than normal.
Hold the analog stick and press to roll out of harm's way quickly.
Hold the analog stick and press to cloak yourself in electricity and quickly roll out of harm's way. Enemies take damage on contact.
Hold the analog stick and press to quickly handspring out of harm's way.
Hold the analog stick and press to cloak yourself in fire and quickly handspring out of harm's way. Enemies take damage on contact.
Press in midair for a burst of speed.
Press in midair to cloak yourself in ice.
Lock onto enemies and press as they attack to quickly whirl around behind them.
Hold in midair to glide.
Hold in midair to glide at high speed.
Hold in midair to cloak yourself in fire and glide. Enemies take damage on contact.
Press while sliding to perform a charging attack that sends enemies flying.
Hold the analog stick and press for a burst of speed which can also be used to evade enemy attack.[sic]
Press mid-combo to quickly close in on an enemy.
Press just as enemies attack to teleport behind them.
Press mid-jump to leap even higher into the air.
Press to block head-on attacks.
Press to block head-on attacks and recover HP if successful.
Press to block head-on attacks and restore some of the Focus Gauge if successful.
Press to block head-on attacks and stun your attackers if successful.
Press to block head-on attacks and poison your attackers if successful.
Press to block attacks from all sides.
Press to block attacks from all sides and recover HP if successful.
Press to block attacks from all sides and restore some of the Focus Gauge if successful.
Press to block attacks from all sides and confuse your attackers if successful.
Press to block attacks from all sides and inflict Stop on your attackers if successful.
Press right after a successful Block to counter with a flurry of blows.
Press after a successful Reversal to follow up with a jumping attack.
Press after being knocked into the air by a powerful blow to counterattack.
Press after a successful Block to strike the ground and attack surrounding enemies with the aftershock.
Press after being knocked into the air by a powerful blow to counterattack.
Press after succeeding with Barrier to shatter the barrier and send it flying into surrounding enemies.
Press after being knocked into the air by a powerful blow to counterattack.
Press after being knocked into the air by a powerful blow to regain balance.
